title: Fragment
medium:
Medium: silk, gouache
Technique: painted on tabby-on-satin damask panel
dimensions:
H x W: 98 x 50 cm (38 9/16 x 19 11/16 in.)
Other (warp fringe, in addition, at top and bottom): 15 cm (5 7/8 in.)
description: Vertical panel of Buddhist connotation: coarse cream silk damask medallions, fret border at top and bottom; painted in red with sacred umbrella at top and lotus at bottom; long inscription in Tibetan (?) between. Two broad twill selvages. Deep warp fringe top and bottom; inscription and decoration drawn on reverse.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment.Medium: silk, gouache
Technique: painted on tabby-on-satin damask panel. 1957-92-32.
